attributes.action: force schools to start before 8am or after 9:30pm in order to reduce congestion.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: During school holidays, traffic is much lighter due to parents not having to drive to schools. This proposal would half traffic during the morning rush hour and also force many children to walk to school, potentially reducing child obesity.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
